about.title: Hani Safadi
about.subtitle: Assistant Professor
about.blurb: Hani Safadi is an assistant professor in the Terry College of Business at the University of Georgia and a research collaborator at Mayo Clinic. He is interested in online communities, social media, healthcare information technology, mixed-methods research and the application of computational linguistics in studying qualitative data. He holds a Ph.D. in Management Information Systems from McGill University.
